about.title: About Us
about.content:
3ON Mobile Carwash brings professional car washing services directly to your doorstep. Our team of experienced professionals uses eco-friendly products and state-of-the-art equipment to ensure your vehicle receives the best care possible.

We believe in convenience without compromising quality. Whether you're at home, at work, or anywhere in the UAE, we come to you.

Our mission is to provide exceptional car care services while being environmentally responsible. We use water-efficient techniques and biodegradable cleaning products to minimize our environmental footprint.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At 3ON Mobile Carwash, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy.section1Content: We collect information you provide directly to us, including your name, phone number, email address (optional), and location data when you use our services. We also collect booking history and preferences to improve your experience.
privacy.section2Content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, process your bookings, communicate with you about your appointments, send promotional offers (with your consent), and track your loyalty rewards.
privacy.section3Content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.section4Content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time through your profile settings or by contacting us directly.
privacy.section5Content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at info@3on.ae

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: Welcome to 3ON Mobile Carwash. By using our services, you agree to these Terms and Conditions.
terms.section1Content: By booking a service with 3ON Mobile Carwash, you agree to provide accurate location information and ensure your vehicle is accessible at the scheduled time.
terms.section2Content: Bookings can be made through our app or WhatsApp. Cancellations must be made at least 2 hours before the scheduled appointment to avoid any cancellation fees.
terms.section3Content: Payment can be made via cash upon service completion or through our secure online payment system. All prices are in UAE Dirhams (AED) and include VAT.
terms.section4Content: Our loyalty program offers a free wash after every 6 paid washes. Free washes are automatically applied to your 7th booking. Loyalty rewards are non-transferable and cannot be exchanged for cash.
terms.section5Content: While we take utmost care during our services, 3ON Mobile Carwash is not liable for any pre-existing damage to your vehicle. We recommend informing our staff of any existing issues before the service begins.
terms.section6Content: For any questions regarding these terms, please contact us at info@3on.ae
